TopicTitle: [1.1.2] Super 100 Shooting Star & Super 67 Little Star Command Pods.

Articles.Content: So I have found a bunch of information with regards to creating a new mod, is there any information in terms of fixing an old one?
Im having some strange problems when using this mod in 1.22, like heat shield exploding, ladder turning upside-down, etc. Any chance we can get it right？

Hi guys,

Don't mean to bring up this old post unnecessarily but I actually came across these pods last week and love them. I had the problem with the pod rockets having their thrustVector really off. So I opened them up in blender and fixed the incorrect angle. I also made a cargo variant with <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> that has no Kerbals, a probe module and <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> Inventory. This is basically like the dragon cargo variant. I also changed the textures so the windows are not glass, they are the hull colour, looks kinda cool.

Not sure what the rules area as I know this is someone else's work but I fixed the problem I see a few people have had and would be great if people could use these pods again... maybe its worth me sharing the files?

EDIT: This is in the latest version of KSP BTW

**Edited <time datetime="2018-01-21T14:52:44Z" title="01/21/2018 02:52  PM" data-short="6 yr">January 21, 2018</time> by thevegimobil**
Seem that the license allows forking.

I have no idea how licenses work, sorry.

I take from what you said: it allows the editing of the original content and sharing of such edits? Only wnat to give it out if people actually think it would be useful etc... don't want to step on anyone's toes, seems like this has been quiet for a while.

C

@thevegimobil

great work! could you share your work in some way (even just with me? :D)
Moderator please close this thread, ownership of mod transferred to [@zer0Kerbal](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/190933-zer0kerbal/).
